title: Teddy Bridgewater Sweepstakes Heats Up + The Mailbag
itunes:title: Teddy Bridgewater Sweepstakes Heats Up + The Mailbag
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling & Colleen Wolfe - react to the latest news from around the league, including a season-ending injury for a Patriots rookie (6:00), Dez Bryant meets with the Cleveland Browns (13:00), John Elway says he’s not interested in revisiting Colin Kaepernick as Broncos QB (18:30), a new kicker duel heats up (23:00), and the latest chapter in Tyrod-Gate (25:00). The heroes review Thursday night’s slate of preseason games (29:00) and answer your questions in the latest Mailbag (44:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
